snippet: Britain's economy will grow faster than previously expected this year and should exceed its January 2008 peak size in the next few months, a leading economic research body said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Britain Set for Stronger Growth Than Previously Expected-NIESR
headline.main: Britain Set for Stronger Growth Than Previously Expected-NIESR

lead_paragraph: Britain's economy will grow faster than previously expected this year and should exceed its January 2008 peak size in the next few months, a leading economic research body said on Friday.
